titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a credit for algae derived fuels, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/18/2008--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income and excise tax credit for the production of algae derived fuel and fuel mixtures. Defines "algae derived fuel" as a liquid hydrocarbon product that is derived from the biomass of algal organisms (single- or multi-cellular organisms that are inherently photosynthetic and aquatic). Terminates such credits after 2012.
